placeholderImages.description: A golden-brown, crispy Masala Dosa folded over a spiced potato filling, served on a banana leaf.
A serving of soft, white Idlis in a bowl of hot Sambar, garnished with fresh coriander.
A bowl of savory Ven Pongal topped with cashews, black pepper, and a drizzle of ghee.
A rich and flavorful bowl of Bisi Bele Bath, a complete meal with rice, lentils, and vegetables.
A bright yellow bowl of tangy Lemon Rice, garnished with peanuts and fresh curry leaves.
